scripts.compile: mkdir -p dist && API_URL=https://diffchecker-api-production.herokuapp.com GA_ID=UA-8857839-4 GA_DOMAIN=http://www.diffchecker.com babel --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables src --out-dir dist
scripts.compile_windows: del dist&&mkdir dist&&set API_URL=https://diffchecker-api-production.herokuapp.com&&set GA_ID=UA-8857839-4&&set GA_DOMAIN=http://www.diffchecker.com&&babel --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables src --out-dir dist
scripts.test: npm run compile && node dist/diffchecker.js test/file1.js test/file2.js
